io.github.kushnirvladyslav.EventSubscribers

Class BatchEventSubscriber

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kushnirvladyslav.EventSubscriber
      • io.github.kushnirvladyslav.ProcessingListEventSubscriber
        • io.github.kushnirvladyslav.ProcessingListEventErrorSubscriber
          • io.github.kushnirvladyslav.EventSubscribers.BatchEventSubscriber
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class BatchEventSubscriber
extends ProcessingListEventErrorSubscriber
    Event subscriber that processes events in batches. Extends ProcessingListEventErrorSubscriber to provide batch processing capabilities with error handling.

    This subscriber accumulates events of the same type until reaching a specified batch size, then processes them as a group using ListEvents.

    Since:
    2025-07-31
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vladyslav Kushnir
    See Also:
    ProcessingListEventErrorSubscriber, ListEvents

    • Constructor Detail

      • BatchEventSubscriber

        public BatchEventSubscriber(int batchSize,
                            boolean autoRun)
        Creates a new BatchEventSubscriber with specified batch size and auto-run option.
        Parameters:
        batchSize - the number of events to accumulate before processing
        autoRun - if true, automatically starts event processing
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if batchSize is less than or equal to 0

      • BatchEventSubscriber

        public BatchEventSubscriber(int batchSize)
        Creates a new BatchEventSubscriber with specified batch size without auto-run.
        Parameters:
        batchSize - the number of events to accumulate before processing
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if batchSize is less than or equal to 0
